title: YouTube censors vaccines film, reverses under pressure
description:
If you haven't been following the drama on Twitter, YouTube took down our last film 'Vaccine & Dark Horse, Final Word', rejected our appeal and issued a community guidelines strike against the channel for 'medical misinformation'.

They have relented after public pressure on Twitter and inquiries from the veteran journalist Matt Taibbi, who has just published an article about the situation: https://taibbi.substack.com/p/meet-the-censored-ivermectin-critic?r=5mz1&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web&utm_source=twitter

The Dark Horse & Vaccines film is being reissued now, I have fixed the problem with the last half hour of the film, link here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w4l81QkQ33k&t=446s
